structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 42, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 67, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 485, sec. 31, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 1, effective April 19, 1988.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Service credit bonus for early retirement -- Payments by agencies -- Forfeiture upon reemployment.
